hero.idea_01: Do you have an idea? If you have an idea, you already have a website.

projects.title: Haras los Pellines
projects.description: Landing Page created using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript, with a contact form implemented using AWS technologies.

projects.title: LanguageLife
projects.description: Multilingual Landing Page for Language and Art Academy, with a Gallery section with the paintings made and a history of the exhibitions in which they have participated.

projects.title: Psychologist Alex Oyarzún
projects.description: Professional Landing Page for psychologist Alex Oyazún. It presents the professional, his services and his social networks. It is not available in some countries at the request of the client.

projects.title: Nico Castro Photography
projects.description: Professional Landing Page for photographer Nicolas Castro. It presents the professional, his services, his social networks and some of his work.

projects.title: Fidias Place
projects.description: Professional Landing Page for a dance academy, with details of its services and schedules.
